definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
to march at parade step/March! (military command)

sentences.english: I like to watch handsome goose-stepping soldiers, too.
sentences.chinese: 我也愛看英挺的軍人踏正步。

sentences.english: Our company is going on the right track.
And besides the incredible synchronized goose-stepping, there were tanks and new missiles.
sentences.chinese: 除了令人難以置信的走正步外，還有就是坦克與導彈。

sentences.english: There were also thousands of goose-stepping soldiers, marching in perfect unison.
sentences.chinese: 同時還有成千上萬踏着正步的士兵以完美的步伐進場。

definition: to march at parade step/March! (military command)
honor guard/guard of honor/the banner bearing contingent leading a military procession
striding forward with head high (idiom); to walk with spirited and vigorous step/to strut
head high, chest out (idiom); to keep up one's spirits/in fine mettle (of animal)
to drill/to exercise/to go outdoors for physical exercise
T-step (basic dance position, with the feet forming a T shape)
